name: Cave Slime
description:
Cave Slime is a platformer where you play as a Slime exploring a cave to try to find the golden pickaxe. It takes about 5 minutes to beat and was made in a week. I hope you enjoy!

***IF YOU ARE USING A CONTROLLER, PRESS ANY BUTTON TO PLAY/RESTART THE GAME***

NOTE: If possible, play either the Linux or Windows version, as those look the best and have the most effects.
